$ZIM - I made a mistake stating that you must own the stock shares by the record date in order to receive the dividend. I was going by the standard rule of dividends which does not apply to this special dividend.
So if you bought after the record date you will receive the dividend. See the rules below that show that you are entitled to the dividend even if you bought after the record date.
Sorry for the mistake.
